title: Addressing Workforce Development Challenges in Low-Income Communities
content: For release on delivery  12:50 p.m. EDT  March 28, 2017      Addressing Workforce Development Challenges in Low-Income Communities         Remarks by     Janet L. Yellen     Chair     Board of Governors of the Federal Reserve System     at     “Creating a Just Economy,” the 2017 annual conference of the  National Community Reinvestment Coalition      Washington, D.C.    March 28, 2017
